description: Numbers n such that n! contains n as a string of digits.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
prog: (Haskell)a033180 n = a033180_list !! (n-1)a033180_list = filter ((> 0) . a067109) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 28 2014
